Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
hippo \hip"po\ n. Same as {hippopotamus}.
Syn: hippopotamus, river horse, Hippopotamus amphibius. [WordNet 1.5]

Hippo n 1: an ancient Numidian town in northwestern Africa adjoining present-day Annaba in northeastern Algeria [syn: {Hippo Regius}] 2: massive thick-skinned herbivorous animal living in or around rivers of tropical Africa [syn: {hippopotamus}, {river horse}, {Hippopotamus amphibius}]
